title: Fuzzy Clustering
excerpt: In this blogpost I will be covering one of clustering which sometimes called soft clustering. Fuzzy clustering is form of clustering in which each data point can belong to more than one cluster.

excerpt: Weapons of Math Destruction is a book by Cathy O’Neil (also the author of the blog called mathbabe) which I can define in 4 words: captivating, haunting, honest, and enlightening.

title: Software Guide of Ubuntu 16.04 for my Research
excerpt: Hello everybody, today I am sharing my first guide which is about building my new research computer. This is a small guide for setting up Ubuntu 16.04 and necessary software for my research.

title: The Healthy Habit Revolution
excerpt: The Healthy Habit Revolution by Derek Doepker, is a laconic guide to the Habit development. Even though the book is designed to give reader 21 days to read, I read through it like I read all Personal Development book, while taking notes.

title: Train Your Brain
excerpt: The Brain is a very efficient machine which has control over everything in our bodies and especially in terms of regulating the habit/routine mechanism, but sometimes we cannot really do what we wanted to do with our brains. In this blog post I am going to share some points and some daily routines that we can increase our ability the use our brains.
